org.gbif.portal.action

Class BaseFacetedSearchAction<T,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter,R extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.FacetedSearchRequest<P>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • org.gbif.portal.action.BaseAction
        • org.gbif.portal.action.BaseSearchAction<T,P,R>
          • org.gbif.portal.action.BaseFacetedSearchAction<T,P,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the results content
    P - the search parameter enum
    R - the request type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware, org.apache.struts2.util.ServletContextAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SearchAction, SearchAction

    public abstract class BaseFacetedSearchAction<T,P extends Enum<?> & org.gbif.api.model.common.search.SearchParameter,R extends org.gbif.api.model.common.search.FacetedSearchRequest<P>>
extends BaseSearchAction<T,P,R>
    Provides the basic structure and functionality for: free text search, paginated navigation and faceting navigation. Besides the inherited functionality from BaseSearchAction this class provides several features: - Execution of the search request using an instance of SearchService. - Holds the user selected values of a facet. - Provides the required information for displaying the facet counts.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getFacetCounts

        public Map<P,List<FacetInstance>> getFacetCounts()
        Holds the facet count information retrieved after each search operation. For accessing this field the user interface should be able to referencing map data types. An example of usage of this field could be: <#list facetCounts['RANK'] as count> In the previous example the selected elements of a "select" element will be populated by using the list of counts of the facet 'RANK'.
        Returns:
        the facetCounts

      • getFacetMinimumCount

      • getSelectedFacetCounts

        public Map<P,List<FacetInstance>> getSelectedFacetCounts()
        Gets the facet counts that are part of the current search request filter. Used in the facet UI.
        Returns:
        the selected facet counts if any

      • lookupFacetTitles

        protected void lookupFacetTitles(P facet,
                     com.google.common.base.Function<String,String> getTitleFunction)
        Utility function that sets facet titles. The function uses a function parameter to accomplish this task. The getTitleFunction could provide the actual communication with the service later to provide the required title.
        Parameters:
        facet - the facet
        getTitleFunction - function that returns title using a facet name
